alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Monroe County through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Wren, or 8 miles northwest of Aberdeen, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aberdeen, Prairie, New Wren, Binford, East Aberdeen, New Hamilton, Wren and Strong. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
